alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gilchrist, Bradford, central Alachua, northwestern Putnam, Union, southern Clay, southern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Mcalpin to near Worthington Spring to near Melrose Landing. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Starke, Lake Butler, Keystone Heights, Raiford, Melrose, Worthington Spring, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia and Alachua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
